mapper.insert: insert into dt_monitor_property_template ( equipment_type, equipment_property_template_code, equipment_property_template_name, equipment_property_template_description )values ( #{monitor_property_template.equipment_type}, #{monitor_property_template.equipment_property_template_code}, #{monitor_property_template.equipment_property_template_name}, #{monitor_property_template.equipment_property_template_description} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE dt_monitor_property_template
equipment_type = #{monitor_property_template.equipment_type},
equipment_property_template_code = #{monitor_property_template.equipment_property_template_code},
equipment_property_template_name = #{monitor_property_template.equipment_property_template_name},
equipment_property_template_description = #{monitor_property_template.equipment_property_template_description},
WHERE id=#{monitor_property_template.id}
mapper.select: select * from dt_monitor_property_template order by id
